<!-- Navega√ß√£o entre os grupos -->
<script>
  let currentGroup = 1;
  const totalGroups = 20;

  function setActivePill(index){
    const pills = document.querySelectorAll('.grp-btn[data-group]');
    pills.forEach(btn => {
      const n = Number(btn.getAttribute('data-group'));
      if (n === index){
        btn.classList.add('active');
        btn.setAttribute('aria-current', 'page');
      } else {
        btn.classList.remove('active');
        btn.removeAttribute('aria-current');
      }
    });
  }

  function showGroup(index) {
    for (let i = 1; i <= totalGroups; i++) {
      const el = document.getElementById(`group${i}`);
      if (el) el.style.display = (i === index) ? 'block' : 'none';
    }
    const ind = document.getElementById('group-indicator');
    if (ind) ind.textContent = `Group ${index} of ${totalGroups}`;
    currentGroup = index;
    setActivePill(index);
  }

  function nextGroup() {
    if (currentGroup < totalGroups) showGroup(currentGroup + 1);
  }

  function prevGroup() {
    if (currentGroup > 1) showGroup(currentGroup - 1);
  }

  // Inicia no grupo 1 com p√≠lula ativa
  showGroup(currentGroup);
</script>


<div style="margin-top: 14px; display:flex; justify-content:center; gap:12px;">
  <button class="grp-btn" onclick="prevGroup()">Previous</button>
  <span id="group-indicator" style="align-self:center; font-weight:700;">Group 1 of 20</span>
  <button class="grp-btn" onclick="nextGroup()">Next</button>
</div>
